summary: A young woman, born at the turn of the 20th century, is rendered ageless after an accident. After many solitary years, she meets a man who complicates the eternal life she has settled into.
cast: Blake Lively|Michiel Huisman|Harrison Ford|Ellen Burstyn|Kathy Baker|Amanda Crew|Lynda Boyd|Hugh Ross|Richard Harmon|Fulvio Cecere|Anjali Jay|Hiro Kanagawa|Peter J. title: El secreto de Adaline
